title: Smart Infra Monitoring Portal
description: Built a scalable web portal to monitor and manage enterprise infrastructure. Integrated real-time alerts, asset tracking, and downtime analytics. Reduced manual checks by 80%.

title: Invoice Automation System
description: Automated invoice extraction and validation using OCR and AssistEdge RPA. Integrated with SAP for posting and reconciliation.

title: AI-Powered Chatbot
description: Developed a chatbot using Python and TensorFlow for customer support. Integrated with Slack and Microsoft Teams.

title: E-commerce Recommendation System
description: Built a recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and machine learning algorithms. Improved user engagement by 30%.

title: Real-time Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Created a dashboard using D3.js and Node.js for real-time data visualization. Integrated with WebSocket for live updates.

title: Mobile Expense Tracker App
description: Developed a cross-platform mobile app using React Native for tracking expenses. Integrated with Firebase for real-time data sync.
